pros: Good work environment to be a part of

job_title: EVS Tech in Altus AFB, OK
pros:
Great benefits for a full-time employee
Friendly and helpful co-workers
cons:
No staff cafeteria on the weekend so bring your lunch from home or order out and have it delivered. Or hit the vending machine. 
Short on staffing floors due to Covid 19

review_title: A great place to work for family oriented atmosphere.
job_title: Medical Laboratory Technician in Liberal, KS
pros: I enjoyed the show of support from the management and other staffing. The hospital keeps up with change. The new construction is not only eye pleasing but the new equipment brings patient care to a higher standard. The 101 bed hospital   Is constantly looking for quality physicians to serve the community's needs.
cons: The departments that bring the hospital the most income like the laboratory, cardiopulmonary and radiology seem to be last on the list when it comes to employee recognition.

pros: People, community, market salary, benefits, regular annual pay increases, provide tools and education needed to do the job, care about their employees.
cons: Older doctors try to keep newer doctors out, but is changing fast.

job_title: Patient Account Representative in Albuquerque, NM
pros: Benefits are great and they do take care of there people.
cons: The infrastructure is not solid. The supervision and management is not what it should be.

pros: Excellent Retirement system structure in place
cons: Very corporate attitude, which doesn't work well in a Healthcare setting

review_title: Not a place to work if you want to grow in your profession
pros: The office manager is very supportive to the employees ... that's it nothing eles
cons: No teamwork, doctor make you do all of his work, patients are always waiting 2 to 4 hours to see him .. his P.A is not very good ... never pay OT
